page.title: 06Traffic and Housing
page.content: The increased use and availability of the motor car is rapidly altering our area. Housing development in the area has continued for many years around the once isolated communities of Walton, Pledwick and Kettlethorpe. The vast majority of these new homes have been built in this area because with a car people can easily get to the big cities such as Wakefield, Leeds,Dewsbury and Barnsley. Opportunities for employment within the area are few but it is very popular with people who work else- where. It is still reasonably quiet despite the building that has taken place and there is still some nice country around it.But what will the future hold? Will the country give way to more housing as demand for housing increases? Will landowners be able to resist attractive offers for land?
